Latest release notes for the latest version of the c# [ServiceStackRedis ServiceStack.Redis client].

= Service Stack Redis Client v1.08 Release Notes =

API compatibility:
This version of the client includes support for the Redis 1.3.7 API. This includes support for Redis Sorted Sets and Hash operations.

Breaking API changes:
  * As a result of a breaking change in the Redis 1.3.7 KEYS operations, IRedisClient.AllKeys and IRedisClient.GetKeys() now return a `List<string>`.
